DOC.brief_summary: The study evaluate effect two commercially available weight loss program , TSFL MEDD program , compare self-directed control diet , change body weight 16-week weight loss phase , apparently healthy overweight obese men woman .
DOC.brief_title: Weight Loss Using Take Shape For Life Program Medifast Direct Program Versus Self-Directed Diet
